meanings.definition: The holder of an office or position.
meanings.sent1: The incumbents in the company are experienced and knowledgeable.
meanings.sent2: The incumbents won the election and will continue in their roles.
meanings.sent3: The incumbents at the party were the life of the celebration.
meanings.sent4: The incumbents of the treasure chest were the jewels and gold.
meanings.sent5: The incumbents of the hive are the worker bees who keep it running smoothly.

meanings.definition: Currently holding a specific office or position.
meanings.sent1: The incumbents officials are working on new policies.
meanings.sent2: The incumbents team is leading in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with the incumbents candles.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with the scent of the incumbents flowers.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was decorated with the artwork of the incumbents students.
